issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: TiAPI: Modify SDK JS files to not use deprecated property get/set methods

comments.body:
Note that our "kitchensink-v2" project needs to be updated as well.
It calls {{setText()}} in several places, which logs warnings.
*Closing ticket* Verified improvement in SDK version {{8.0.0.v20181121114345}} no longer get a log warning when creating and building a default titanium application on iOS and Android.
